page.title: 11CLUBS IN BRAMHALL
page.content: {Bramall Park Golf Club}is on Manor Road.The main bulk of members are men. The youngest age limit is 12.The course has 18 holes.Every year around 600 people join or rejoin the club.The course is 91 years old,the clubhouse is 87 years old.They have a professional coach to teach players. To join{Davenport Rugby Club}it costs Â£30 each year.The youngest age limit is 8. 500 people join or rejoin the club each year.The club has 4 coaches to instruct.There are no professionals {Bramhall Lane Lawn Tennis Club}has more females than males.For juniors it costs Â£20 for membership.For seniors it is Â£40.The youngest age limit is 7. 90 people join a year.The oldest players are in their sixties.There are several coaches to teach.390 people are members at present.
